pages.text: Call upon the power of Zeus, and strike down your foes with lightning that will shatter them into pieces.$(br2)The model for this item was created by $(l:https://www.planetminecraft.com/member/hobbeswyn/)Hobbeswyn$(/l) on $(t:Planet Minecraft)PMC$(). Check it out $(l:https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/kold-battle-axe/)here$(/l).

The target will not be struck by lightning if the attack cooldown is active (can be disabled in configuration).$(br2)Striking a target with lightning will cost $(5)1000 $(t:Forge Energy)FE$(). The axe can hold a maximum of $(5)200 k$(t:Forge Energy)FE$().$(br2)On attack, the wielder will be given 6 seconds of fire resistance and 1 second of lightning immunity.
